cnbc.title: Trump's trade war shift away from Chinese manufacturing has reached tipping point
cnbc.summary: A long-term supply chain shift is pulling the rest of Asia even with manufacturing giant China. For importers, a short-term cash crunch from tariffs is looming.

cnbc.title: Bessent says U.S. will finish the year with 3% GDP growth, sees 'very strong' holiday season
cnbc.summary: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the economy will end the year on strong footing and said the president was disappointed in economic coverage in the media.

cnbc.title: Beef prices are soaring. Here's why America is facing record-low cattle numbers
cnbc.summary: Beef prices are up about 15% over the past year as ranchers face record low cattle herds amidst years of drought throughout U.S. farmlands.

cnbc.title: Berkshire Hathaway is on track to lag behind the S&P 500 in Buffett's last year as CEO
cnbc.summary: With less than a month to go, Berkshire Hathaway's B shares are behind the S&P in their 2025 race. With dividends included, the S&P's lead is even bigger.

cnbc.title: Trump administration waives $11 million fine for Southwest Airlines' 2022 holiday meltdown
cnbc.summary: The Trump administration said it will forgive the last $11 million of a fine against Southwest Airlines that stems from the carrier's 2022 holiday meltdown.
